name: Infant Daycare Program
description: in the San Francisco Public Utilities Commission (SFPUC) Building, your child will have expert nurturing and care from our highly competent and experienced staff members. Child ratio is 1:3. Staff work closely with you and your family to: - Accommodate your infant in a manner compatible with your family patterns - Coordinating with you to come in to view or be with your child when you desire - Maintain frequent and daily contact with you thorough a variety of timely hand-written, oral, and elect
